Html:
Do you create categories or tags in "All-In-One Code Framework" program?

For example: WPF, Silverlight, Windows Phone, Windows Form, LINQ.

Hello virusxd

This is a feature in the second version of "Sample Browser" that my team is developing. Currently, you can find samples of a certain category (tech) in the code sample catalog page (http://1code.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=All-In-One%20Code%20Framework%20Sample%20Catalog), and in the download packages by tech (http://1code.codeplex.com/releases/view/55110).

Thanks
Jialiang Ge
Program Manager of All-In-One Code Framework
